Segment.name: CL1
Segment.comment: To supply information specific to hospital claims

Field.name: AdmissionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the priority of this admission

Field.name: AdmissionSourceCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the source of this admission

Field.name: PatientStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating patient status as of the "statement covers through date"

Field.name: NursingHomeResidentialStatusCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the status of a nursing home resident at the time of service
